name: smartvoting-k6-tests
description: Load tests for SmartVoting using k6 and TypeScript

scripts.test:login: npm run build && k6 run dist/login.js
scripts.test:magic: npm run build && k6 run dist/magic_vote.js
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/load/full_voting.test.js

author: Gemini Agent
